title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, August 25, 2020
description: "Without language there is no poetry, without poetry there’s just talk. Talk is cheap and proves nothing." –Charles Wright, former U.S. Poet Laureate
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "Without language there is no poetry, without poetry there’s just talk. Talk is cheap and proves nothing." –Charles Wright, former U.S. Poet Laureate
